detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract VampTokenSale (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VampTokenSale__2.sol#530-770) has payable functions:
	 - VampTokenSale.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VampTokenSale__2.sol#602-605)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [VampTokenSale](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VampTokenSale__2.sol#L530-L770) has payable functions:
	 - [VampTokenSale.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VampTokenSale__2.sol#L602-L605)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
